page.title: 08SCHOOL PLAYGROUND GAMES 2
page.content: {HOT CHOCOLATE}- the best number of players for this game is 10. One of the 10 is chosen to be 'on'. He/she has to stand with his/her face against a wall. The other players stand in a line parallel to the wall about 20 feet away. These people have to try to get to the wall and touch it without being seen by the person who is 'on'. The person facing the wall can turn round at will. When he/she does so, the other players must stand perfectly still. If they are caught moving at all then they must come and stand at the wall and form a chain. This chain can be released from the wall by a touch on the last hand by any player who is free. The game ends when all players are captured and made part of the chain or when the person facing the wall becomes tired of the game.
